permissions.locationExplanation: We need your position to generate poetry according to your movements and environment.
permissions.cameraExplanation: We need your camera to immerse you in the world around you.

texts: You're about to experience a poetic experience – visual and acoustic – while walking
Depending on your speed, but also the time of day, season, temperature, environement, your experience won't be the same...

cheat.title: Build your experience
cheat.chooseMoment: Choose a time of the day

credits.erika: Advice, suggestions and testing. Affiliated to the University of Lancaster.
